resolveMarket(uint256,uint8,int256).details: The PredictionManager will update the market's state to resolved and store the winning outcome.      It should ensure the market exists and is not already resolved.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to resolve.
params.oraclePrice: The price reported by the oracle at the time of resolution.
params.winningOutcome: The determined winning outcome (Bearish or Bullish).

resolveMarket(uint256,uint8,int256).notice: Called by the OracleResolver to resolve a market and set its winning outcome.
